title: Georgia Arrests, Mother's Day Poetry, Earl Thomas and more.
itunes:title: Georgia Arrests, Mother's Day Poetry, Earl Thomas and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Happy Friday, Mother's Day Weekend is here and the entire crew is present and accounted for. Certain states like California and Arizona are lifting stay at home orders today. Junior and Fool #2 both have poetry for all mothers. The two responsible for Ahmaud Arbery's death have been arrested. Today would have been Ahmaud's 26th birthday. Baltimore Ravens star Earl Thomas got caught by his wife with other women and his brother. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve continues on from yesterday's topic. He is reaching out to a few good white folks and also reminds us about the discord between two specific demographics, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
